MODEL_IN_USE.messagePattern: Model `<%= model %>` id `<%= id %>` is in use.

MODIFY_OWN_RECORD.messagePattern: Model `<%= model %>` id `<%= id %>` is used by current logged in user. Cannot modify own record.

DELETE_OWN_RECORD.messagePattern: Model `<%= model %>` id `<%= id %>` is used by current logged in user. Cannot delete own record.

DELETE_LAST_USER.messagePattern: Cannot delete the last user of the system. The system must have at least one user.

DELETE_ACTIVE_OUTBREAK.messagePattern: The outbreak (id: `<%= id %>`) is active for at least another user. Cannot delete an active outbreak.

ONE_ACTIVE_OUTBREAK.messagePattern: There is already an active outbreak (id: `<%= id %>`) in the system.

FUNCTIONALITY_NOT_IMPLEMENTED.messagePattern: The requested functionality is not implemented.

MODEL_NOT_FOUND_IN_CONTEXT.messagePattern: Unknown `<%= model %>` id `<%= id %>` in context of `<%= contextModel %>` id `<%= contextId %>`

MASK_NOT_FOUND.messagePattern: Mask not found for `<%= type %>` Model `<%= model %>` id / visualId `<%= id %>`

MODEL_VISUAL_ID_MATCHES_MORE_THAN_2_RECO.messagePattern: Model `<%= model %>` with visualId `<%= visualId %>` => ( there are multiple records with this visual id )

MODEL_CONFLICT.messagePattern: Model with id `<%= id %>` already exists

NO_ACTIVE_OUTBREAK.messagePattern: User `<%= username %>` doesn't have an active outbreak

NO_ACCESS_TO_ACTIVE_OUTBREAK.messagePattern: User `<%= username %>` doesn't have access to active outbreak through client outbreaks

VALIDATION_ERROR.messagePattern: The `<%= model %>` instance is not valid. Details: <%= details %>

MISSING_REQUIRED_PERMISSION.messagePattern: Logged in user must have (at least) one of the following permissions to access this endpoint: <%= permissions %>.

INVALID_PASSWORD.messagePattern: The password must be at least <%= length %> characters in length.

INVALID_SECURITY_QUESTIONS.messagePattern: Security questions must be different and answers can not be empty.

ACCESS_DENIED.messagePattern: Logged in user doesn't have access this endpoint: <%= accessErrors %>.

INVALID_CASE_RELATIONSHIP.messagePattern: The case `<%= id %>` needs to be related to another case or event and it must be a target in that relationship in order to be able to convert it to a contact

INVALID_CONTACT_RELATIONSHIP.messagePattern: The contact `<%= id %>` needs to be related to another contact and it must be a target in that relationship in order to be able to convert it to a contact a contact of contact

INVALID_CONTACT_OF_CONTACT_RELATIONSHIP.messagePattern: The contact of contact `<%= id %>` needs to be related to another case or event and it must be a target in that relationship in order to be able to convert it to a contact

MODEL_NOT_EDITABLE.messagePattern: Model `<%= model %>` id `<%= id %>` is not editable (read-only).

MISSING_REQUIRED_PROPERTY.messagePattern: Model `<%= model %>` is missing required properties: <%= properties %>.

DUPLICATE_TEMPLATE_QUESTION_VARIABLE_OR_.messagePattern: A template cannot contain duplicate question variables and a template question cannot contain duplicate answer value

MODEL_IDENTIFIERS_ARE_NOT_UNIQUE_IN_CONT.messagePattern: The `<%= model %>` is invalid. Details: <%= details %>

DEACTIVATE_PARENT_MODEL.messagePattern: This `<%= model %>` still has sub models that are active. Please make sure to deactivate all child models before deactivating a parent model.

DUPLICATE_VISUAL_ID.messagePattern: The visual identifier `<%= id %>` is not unique.

INVALID_TRANSLATIONS_FILE.messagePattern: The provided language file `<%= fileName %>` is invalid: <%= details %>

UNSUPPORTED_FILE_TYPE.messagePattern: The provided file `<%= fileName %>` is invalid: <%= details%>

UNSUPPORTED_FILE_TYPE_IN_ZIP.messagePattern: The provided file `<%= fileName %>` is invalid: <%= details%>

INVALID_GENERATE_FOLLOWUP_PARAMS.messagePattern: Invalid follow up generation parameters. Details: `<%= details %>`

IMPORT_PARTIAL_SUCCESS.messagePattern:
Import partial success. Some `<%= model %>` instances failed to be imported. Successfully imported: <%= success %> 
Failed to be imported: <%= failed %>

INVALID_SNAPSHOT_FILE.messagePattern: The provided database snapshot is invalid.

DELETE_CONTACT_LAST_RELATIONSHIP.messagePattern: Cannot delete the last relationship exposure because the person with ID <%= contactIDs %> doesn't have an additional relationship exposure.

EXTERNAL_API_CONNECTION_ERROR.messagePattern: Communication with external service (<%= serviceName %>) failed

UNEXPECTED_EXTERNAL_API_RESPONSE.messagePattern: External service (<%= serviceName %>) returned an invalid response

ACCESS_DENIED_TO_ROUTE_FOR_APP.messagePattern: The requested route (`<%= route %>`) is not accessible on <%= app %> deployment.

INVALID_FOLLOW_UP_DATE.messagePattern: Invalid follow up date, it exceeds the configured period.

UPSTREAM_SERVER_NOT_CONFIGURED.messagePattern: Upstream server with url `<%= upstreamServerURL %>` is not configured in system settings

UPSTREAM_SERVER_SYNC_DISABLED.messagePattern: Sync with upstream server `<%= upstreamServerName %>` is disabled

UPSTREAM_SERVER_SYNC_FAILED.messagePattern: Sync with upstream server `<%= upstreamServerName %>` failed

UPSTREAM_SERVER_SYNC_IN_PROGRESS.messagePattern: There is already a sync with upstream server `<%= upstreamServerName %>` in progress. Only a sync action can be in progress at a time.

UPSTREAM_SERVER_EXPORT_FAILED.messagePattern: Database export of the upstream server `<%= upstreamServerName %>` failed

INSTANCE_SYNC_PARTIAL_FAILURE.messagePattern: Instance sync failed partially (incomplete sync): `<%= syncError %>`

INSTANCE_EXPORT_STILL_IN_PROGRESS.messagePattern: Instance export is still in progress`

INVALID_RELATIONSHIP_WITH_DISCARDED_CASE.messagePattern: Cannot create/modify relationships with discarded cases (case id: `<%= id %>` )

INVALID_VISUAL_ID_MASK.messagePattern: Provided Visual ID template `<%= visualIdTemplate %>` does not match Visual ID mask set on outbreak level `<%= outbreakVisualIdMask %>`

CONTACT_AND_RELATIONSHIP_REQUIRED.messagePattern: Both contact and relationship are required when creating a contact

MULTIPLE_CONTACTS_CREATION_PARTIAL_SUCCE.messagePattern: Multiple contact creation partial Success. Some contact instances failed to be created.

INVALID_RELATIONSHIP_SOURCE_TYPE.messagePattern: Invalid person type `<%= type %>` provided as relationship source.

CONTACT_CANT_BE_SOURCE.messagePattern: A contact can't be the source in a relationship ( it can only be a target )

CONTACT_OF_CONTACT_CANT_BE_SOURCE.messagePattern: A contact of contact can't be the source in a relationship ( it can only be a target )

CIRCULAR_RELATIONSHIP.messagePattern: You can't have a relationship between the same records

BULK_CREATE_RELATIONSHIP_ERRORS.messagePattern: At least one relationship failed to be created. Successfully created: <%= created.count %>. Failed to create: <%= failed.count %>

MAPS_GEO_LOCATION_ERROR.messagePattern: An error occurred while trying to retrieve geo-location for specified address from the Maps API

ADDRESS_MUST_HAVE_USUAL_PLACE_OF_RESIDEN.messagePattern: One of the addresses must be set as Current address

ADDRESS_MULTIPLE_USUAL_PLACE_OF_RESIDENC.messagePattern: Multiple addresses set as Current address. Only one address should be set as Current address

ADDRESS_PREVIOUS_PLACE_OF_RESIDENCE_MUST.messagePattern: Addresses set as Previous Current address must have a date set

MODEL_PROPERTY_CONFLICT.messagePattern: Model with `<%= propertyName %>`: `<%= propertyValue %>` already exists

LOCATION_NO_GEOLOCATION_INFORMATION.messagePattern: The location you have used (id: `<%= id %>`) does not have Geo-Location information

BULK_UPDATE_PARTIAL_SUCCESS.messagePattern:
Bulk Update Partial Success. Some `<%= model %>` instances failed to be updated. Successfully updated: <%= success %> 
Failed to be updated: <%= failed %>

BULK_UPDATE_FAILED.messagePattern: Bulk Update Failed. `<%= model %>` instances failed to be updated: <%= failed %>

MULTIPLE_CONTACTS_UPDATE_PARTIAL_SUCCESS.messagePattern: Multiple contacts update partial success. Some contact instances failed to be updated.

SYNC_PACKAGE_FOR_USER_WITHOUT_TEAMS.messagePattern: Sync package cannot be generated for user `<%= userEmail %>` as it is not assigned to any team

MISSING_REQUIRED_OLD_PASSWORD.translation: Old password is required when changing passwords

ACTION_TEMPORARILY_BLOCKED.messagePattern: This action has been blocked temporarily

CONTACT_OF_CONTACT_AND_RELATIONSHIP_REQU.messagePattern: Both contact of contact and relationship are required when creating a contact of contact

MULTIPLE_CONTACTS_OF_CONTACT_CREATION_PA.messagePattern: Multiple contact of contact creation partial Success. Some contact instances failed to be created.

IMPORT_DATA_NOT_PROCESSED.messagePattern: Import worker stopped with error before processing data

INVALID_ADDRESS_LATITUDE_LONGITUDE.messagePattern: Invalid address longitude/latitude. Might be out of bounds

INVALID_FILE_CONTENTS_SPREADSHEET_FORMUL.messagePattern: Invalid file contents. File contains formulae in cell <%= cell %> which is not supported

INVALID_FILE_SIZE.messagePattern: Uploaded file size is bigger than configured maxFileSize

DUPLICATE_ALTERNATE_UNIQUE_IDENTIFIER.messagePattern: The alternate unique identifier corresponds to more than one existing records. Alternate unique identifier query: <%= alternateIdQuery %>
